column3: News;Pursat province:------ A 10-year-old boy accidentally shot his brother
column5: and leaving him needing medical treatment in Phnom Penh.------ The incident happened at 9:10 am on Sunday
column8: in Bakan district.------The 12-year-old victim suffered severe head injuries after being shot at a range of about 50 m.------The 10 year old and his father who built the weapon are being questioned by police. ------https://kbn.news/archives/126301
